txt.en: His fingers grace over the woodworking tools as if they were precious jewellery or fine cloth.\n\n'Thanks for bringing these back to me. I would have gone myself, but I am not ready for the conversations that await me back there.'
A Corsair has asked you to retrieve some woodworking tools from his former comrades at Tathrendalf.
You have retrieved Aradax's woodworking tools from Tathrendalf.\n\nTalk to Aradax in Lothgobel.

'When I left Tathrendalf I had to do it quickly. In my haste, I left my prized woodworking tools behind. I can get by without them, but these have some sentimental value.\n\n'Should you find yourself in Tathrendalf, look for a wooden crate edged with iron. I kept all of my kit in there.'
Aradax has asked you to retrieve his woodworking tools from Tathrendalf to the north-east.
